title: Argo Workflows
description: Learn how to run workflows on Kubernetes using Argo Workflows.

courses.title: Getting Started
courses.description: Learn how how to set-up Argo Workflows and run your first workflow.

courses.title: Templates
courses.description: Learn about different types of templates, including key types such as container and DAG.

courses.title: Inputs and Outputs
courses.description: Learn about input and outputs, including parameters and artifacts.

courses.title: Workflow Templates and CRON Workflows
courses.description: Learn how to reuse workflows with WorkflowTemplates, and learn how to run workflows on schedule with CRON.

courses.title: Using the API
courses.description: Learn about submitting workflows using the Argo Server's REST API.
